amendment.description: Amendment deletes language which prohibits the Health Insurance Coverage for Contraceptives Act of 2000 from taking effect.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in the Congressional Record to strike paragraph (a) of section 168. Paragraph (a) prohibits the city-council-approved measure requiring insurers to cover contraceptives from taking effect.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
